description:
I see the following error on running clone
# bzr clone lp:nova
bzr: ERROR: Connection error: while sending POST /bazaar/: [Errno 110] Connection timed out

dmesg does not show any errors. Please help.

Thanks.
title: bzr clone lp:nova returns Errno 110

comments.content:
I see the following error on running clone
# bzr clone lp:nova
bzr: ERROR: Connection error: while sending POST /bazaar/: [Errno 110] Connection timed out

dmesg does not show any errors. Please help.

Thanks.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mpetrus

comments.content:
It looks like you may be behind a proxy that doesn't allow SSH?

I'm going to go ahead and close this bug (since it's not a Nova bug) -- for any future questions you may have, feel free to hit up https://answers.launchpad.net/nova -- you will get a much speedier response there.

Hope this helps.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jk0

comments.content:
Is the following also related to this issue, or something else?

 nova-manage network create 10.0.0.0/8 1 64
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/local/bin/nova-manage", line 5, in <module>
    pkg_resources.run_script('nova==2010.1', 'nova-manage')
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/dist-packages/pkg_resources.py", line 467, in run_script
    self.require(requires)[0].run_script(script_name, ns)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/dist-packages/pkg_resources.py", line 1200, in run_script
    execfile(script_filename, namespace, namespace)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.6/dist-packages/nova-2010.1-py2.6.egg/EGG-INFO/scripts/nova-manage", line 81, in <module>
    flags.DECLARE('fixed_range', 'nova.network.manager')
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.6/dist-packages/nova-2010.1-py2.6.egg/nova/flags.py", line 166, in DECLARE
    __import__(module_string, globals(), locals())
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.6/dist-packages/nova-2010.1-py2.6.egg/nova/network/manager.py", line 47, in <module>
    flags.DEFINE_string('vpn_ip', utils.get_my_ip(),
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.6/dist-packages/nova-2010.1-py2.6.egg/nova/utils.py", line 155, in get_my_ip
    csock.connect(('www.google.com', 80))
  File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/eventlet/greenio.py", line 161, in connect
    while not socket_connect(fd, address):
  File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/eventlet/greenio.py", line 35, in socket_connect
    raise socket.error(err, errno.errorcode[err])
socket.error: [Errno 110] ETIMEDOUT
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mpetrus

comments.content:
This would be a different issue. What you could do is set the following flag in your flagfile:

--vpn_ip=<the IP of your networking node>
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jk0

comments.content:
Thanks, where is this flagfile? I am following the instructions on
 http://wiki.openstack.org/RunningNova

-----Original Message-----
From: <email address hidden> [mailto:<email address hidden>] On Behalf Of Josh Kearney
Sent: Thursday, March 10, 2011 3:13 PM
To: Margaret Petrus
Subject: [Bug 732236] Re: bzr clone lp:nova returns Errno 110

This would be a different issue. What you could do is set the following
flag in your flagfile:

--vpn_ip=<the IP of your networking node>

--
